## Description
The backpack is the most crucial part of the Portable Life-Support System (PLSS).&#10;&#9;&#9;It is made with polyethylene and a steel frame.

## Characteristics

| Attribute      | Value |
|--------:|:------|
|Mass:|5.0 kg|
|Type:|EVA|
